meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #8000.

div.div: James Holzhauer game 27. James breaks the $2 million mark.

td.p: Susan Waller, a K-12 school administrator from Chester, Pennsylvania
Sam Kooistra, a criminal defense lawyer from Tucson, Arizona
James Holzhauer, a professional sports gambler from Las Vegas, Nevada (whose 26-day cash winnings total $1,991,135)

tr.td: CLUES ACROSS TEXAS
(Alex: Each clue will be delivered by a personality from one of our affiliated stations in the great state of Texas.)
ADVERBS
HIP-HOP TO IT
"GREEN" BOOK
FAMOUS LEFTIES
THE BIG UNIT OF MEASURE

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Hi, I\'m Deborah Knapp for KENS 5.) The Witte Museum\'s collection includes a fiddle filled with rattlesnake rattles that belonged to this frontiersman & onetime Congressman who met his end at the Alamo')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Hi, I'm Deborah Knapp for KENS 5.) The Witte Museum's collection includes a fiddle filled with rattlesnake rattles that belonged to this frontiersman & onetime Congressman who met his end at the Alamo
